item.title: The Vendor Client relationship - in real world situations
item.description: As a small business owner, I have to say... Best video ever.

item.title: Nordaaker's Services
item.description: In addition to our own web applications, Nordaaker provides various consulting services, mostly related to web development and Perl/Catalyst. We have just added a page describing those services to our home page. If you are interested in using our services, please send me an email. We are based in Oslo, Norway, but willing to travel/telecommute.
